description:
When navigating squishy trails, slushy sidewalks, and mucky dog parks, these waterproof boots will keep your feet warm and dry. It can feel like a bit much wearing your hiking boots around town, so Keen winterized their classic Targhee. Loaded with technical details to keep you comfortable on winter’s worst days, the Targhee II is ready to step out into the cold. And, Keen’s classically generous fit leaves room for your favourite woolly socks.

  • Waterproof leather sourced from a Leather Working Group certified tannery. The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment
  • Equipped with KEEN.Dry™ waterproof, breathable membrane
  • Insulated with 200g of KEEN.Warm™ recycled insulation for cold weather protection on winter’s days
  • Heat shield footbed captures and reflects body heat
  • Insoles are infused with an anti-odour treatment
  • Supportive EVA midsole offers lightweight comfort
  • Chunky sole with 4mm lugs clears snow and mud with ease
  • Keen rates these boots down to -32°C
name: Keen Targhee II Waterproof Winter Boots - Men's
